thread.section_title: Arlo NoMad - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Micro Hotel
thread.title_full: Great Micro Hotel - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Yudu G
title: Great Micro Hotel
text:
Kim (Assistant Manager) was amazing! The rooms are perfect for our team's business trips, and the hotel is in a great location. This is now our go-to hotel when staying in New York City. The FREE live music on Thursdays is a great touch too
Room Tip: Bunk bed Rooms are a little more spacious and work well for a single person See more room tips
